Introduction

Chloe is a South Korean singer under C9 Entertainment. She was a member of the girl group cignature and she joined the group on June 14th 2021 following the departure of Haeun and Sunn. She made her debut with the girl group on November 30 with their second EP Dear Diary Moment.

Chloe is currently pursuing a degree in data science, she is a student at the esteemed University of Michigan, which is among the top colleges in the United States.

She passed auditions for 9 different companies, including Starship Ent., Cube Ent., FNC Ent., and BELIFT Lab.
